title: Pop-up: Drop-off & AVT

title: Workshop: DIY CFT Basics
description: Learn to build your own Continuous Flow Through (CFT) vermireactor. Hands-on session covering design, operation, and troubleshooting.

title: Volunteer Shift: Node Setup & Bulking
description: Help us set up a new collection node and prepare bulking materials. All skill levels welcome.

title: Spring Pop-up: Garden Kickoff
description: Spring garden kickoff! Drop off organics, pick up vermicast for your garden beds, and learn about spring planting.

title: Workshop: QA/QC for AVT
description: Deep dive into quality assurance and quality control protocols for AVT production. Learn about maturity testing, pH/EC monitoring, and batch documentation.
